name: Toyota Fortuner
description: The price of Toyota Fortuner, a 7 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 33.43  - 51.44 Lakh. It is available in 7 variants, with engine options ranging from 2694 to 2755 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Fortuner has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 7 airbags. Toyota Fortuner is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 10 to 14.4 kmpl for Fortuner.

variants.variant_name: Fortuner 4X2 MT 2.7 Petrol 2694 cc, Petrol, Manual, 10 kmpl, 164 bhp
